const int nepoch = 20;
const int nrun = 11;
int irun=0;

TGraph *g = new TGraph();
g->SetTitle(Form("learning rate:%f  weight decay:%f",lrwd[0],lrwd[1])); 
g->GetXaxis()->SetTitle("epoch"); 
g->GetYaxis()->SetTitle("returning"); 
for(int i=0;i<20;i++){
  double ycoord = returning[i];
  // if(returning[i]>100) ycoord = 300;
  g->SetPoint(i,i,returning[i]);
}
g->Draw();
